query:
SELECT
	t.id,
	t.route_id,
	t.direction,
	t.vehicle_id,
	t.created_at,
	t.deviation,
	jsonb_agg(jsonb_build_object('stop_id',
	bst.stop_id,
	'arrival',
	bst.arrival,
	'departure',
	bst.departure,
	'stop_sequence',
	bst.stop_sequence)
ORDER BY
	bst.arrival) AS stop_times, 
	(
	SELECT
		brs.headsign
	FROM
		bus_route_stops brs
	WHERE
		brs.route_id = t.route_id
		AND brs.direction = t.direction
	LIMIT 1) AS headsign
FROM
	bus_trips t
LEFT JOIN bus_stop_times bst ON
	t.id = bst.trip_id
WHERE
	t.id = $1
GROUP BY
	t.id
